title: ExperimentDiff
description: Schema for modifications applied to experiment data by process_data_use_case_specific.

degassing.description: Type of gas used for degassing, if detected.

rinse.description: List of solvents used for rinsing, inferred from realizationText.

wait_after_rinse.description: Wait duration after rinse, in hours. If not applicable, use null.

wash_solid.description: Wash solid type inferred from realizationText. If not applicable, use null.

evaporate.description: Whether evaporation (vacuum) was applied after scCO2 step.
